title: Capitol Report: Facebook discloses record lobbying spending as Zuckerberg braces for House hearing
text: Facebook Inc. disclosed late Monday that it spent $4.8 million to influence U.S. lawmakers and regulators in the third quarter, lifting its year-to-date spending on Washington lobbying to $12.3 million — a level that already nearly matches 2018’s full-year total of $12.6 million.

title: Facebook’s fight to prevent deepfake dystopia gets a powerful partner in Amazon Web Services
